name: Rise of Koreth
description: Rise of Koreth is an epic action adventure game where you delve into the dark stronghold of Koreth the Blight King. In the dark depths of his dungeons and caves there many dangerous foes you will have to vanquish and traps and obstacles to avoid. Uncover the mysteries of Koreth's resting place in this exciting hack n slash, dungeon crawler, platformer adventure.
